oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hand-tinted composite tintypes of officer, woman & child
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This composite hand-tinted tintype, perhaps created postwar and reprinted on cardstock, pictures an unknown soldier with his wife and child. He wore the uniform of a 2nd lieutenant, with a sword belt, a model 1860 cavalry sword, and red silk sash.
